privacy.policy1: G-Tech Digital Solutions respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal data of its users, in accordance with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (Law No. 13.709/2018 – LGPD). We collect only the information strictly necessary to improve your experience on our website, respond to contact requests, and provide our services with quality.
privacy.policy2: The personal data collected may include name, email, phone number, company, and other information voluntarily provided by you through forms. They are used exclusively to respond to requests, improve our services, and send relevant communications (when authorized). All information is stored securely and protected against unauthorized access.
privacy.policy3: G-Tech Digital Solutions does not share, sell, or transfer your personal data to third parties, except when required by law, regulation, court decision, or when necessary to comply with legal or contractual obligations.
privacy.policy4: We use cookies and navigation analysis tools to better understand user behavior on the site and optimize your experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may be affected.
privacy.policy5: Under the LGPD, you may request at any time: access, review, update, or deletion of your personal data, except in cases where there is a legal obligation to retain them. To exercise your rights, please contact us through the channels provided on our website.

quemSomos.texto: G-Tech Digital Solutions is me, Gilberto Silva, a developer passionate about technology and innovation. I work alone but with the dedication of someone who puts their heart into every project. My goal is to create websites, systems, and custom digital solutions focused on what really matters: the growth and success of my clients. At G-Tech, every line of code is crafted with care and attention, combining modern design with performance. More than just delivering a service, I give my best in every detail, ensuring each project has identity, functionality, and impact.

missao.texto: To offer personalized and affordable digital solutions, helping people and businesses stand out online, always with dedication and attention to detail.

visao.texto: To be recognized as a reference in creative and efficient digital solutions, showing that even a one-person team can deliver great results.

itens: Commitment: each project is treated as unique.
